description: Refined for optimal comfort in the saddle, this highly durable and packable waterproof is constructed with breathable Pertex® Shield fabric and features easy-access pockets and an under-helmet hood. When you need a reliable, durable waterproof jacket to shelter you from fast-changing weather, the Cinder Downpour provides packable protection for all your biking adventures. Built with breathable Pertex® Shield fabric, it’s light enough to pack with you wherever you ride, and throw on when a downpour threatens. The jacket has been specifically designed for an on-bike fit, reducing excess fabric where it’s not needed, and featuring an extended back hem to cover your hips while you’re riding.
name: Rab Cinder Downpour Jacket - Mens

specs.value: 40D Pertex® Shield 2.5-Layer construction waterproof technology with fluorocarbon free DWR (120 g
